intro: Aethionema amoenum, commonly known as the rock白菜 or rock mustard, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is a low-growing perennial that typically reaches a height of about 10 to 20 centimeters. The plant features small, bright yellow flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and often covered in a fine layer of white to grayish hairs. Aethionema amoenum thrives in well-drained soils and is often found growing in rocky or sandy habitats.
